channel.title: [PI] HeadIcons

item.title: [PI] HeadIcons
item.dc:creator: @matiasmunk2 matiasmunk2
item.description:
@matiasmunk2 wrote:

Hey, so I tried getting Head Icons working.
Arharm 4 tried to help me, but it turned out it was a Client issue.

I found this in my Client.java:

private void drawHeadIcon() { if(anInt855 != 2) return; calcEntityScreenPos((anInt934 - baseX << 7) + anInt937, anInt936 * 2, (anInt935 - baseY << 7) + anInt938); if(spriteDrawX > -1 && loopCycle % 20 < 10) headIconsHint[0].drawSprite(spriteDrawX - 12, spriteDrawY - 28); }

Any ideas?

Read full topic
